property.name: Text
property.value: Pick one Agent in the Team. That Agent is placed 10 cards down, face up, in the owning player's Bureau deck. Any equipment the Agent had is discarded. When the Agent's card reaches the top of the deck, the Agent is immediately moved to the Hospital (undamaged). This card does not initiate combat.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "The government knows about it you know. They're even in on it sometimes. Right there in the room when they come. They work together with a secret corporation." - Duane Barry

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: He may choose to add to the Conspiracy Pool instead of the Resource Pool during his Briefing Phase.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Alex Krycek is a clean cut agent who professes an admiration for agent Mulder and his work on the X-Files. Krycek worked with Mulder in apprehending Augustus Cole (Sleepless) and in searching for Dana Scully after her abduction (Ascension). What no one else knows is that he is a double agent working for the Cigarette Smoking Man. He aided in the abduction of Scully, killed Mulder's father, attempted to kill Mulder (he shot Scully instead), and was present at Melissa Scully's murder.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place 3 tokens on this card. Discard token to examine any one Bluff card. Place Bluff card back on the Site after examining.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Agent Dana Scully is a well respected agent who, at one time, taught at Quantico. She is trained in the areas of forensics and pathology and is highly skeptical of paranormal activity. Teamed with Mulder, she balances his theories with scientific reason.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: RPs generated by Mulder must be used to purchase cards. Place 3 tokens on this card. Discard a token to play a Site for 0 [RP] cost.

property.name: Bio
property.value: One of the FBI's most accomplished detectives, Fox Mulder uses his background in psychology to track down and profile a variety of serial killers. His real interest is paranormal phenomena, an obsession that earned him the nickname "Spooky".

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place a token on Hosteen's card. Discard a token to examine your opponent's hand. Select any one Conspiracy card. If your opponent plays that card at any time in the game, you may immediately ask one question about the X‐File. This question may only be asked the first time the card is played.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Albert Hosteen is a Navajo Tribal Elder. He met and assisted Agent Mulder during the events depicted in "Anasazi", "The Blessing Way", and "Paper Clip". He performed a ritual that helped Mulder survive injuries inflicted on him by the Cigarette Smoking Man.

property.name: Text
property.value: Negate any one Keyword Event card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "They take you aboard the ship to perform the tests."Duane Barry: "They drill holes in my teeth. They drill holes in my damn teeth!"

property.name: Text
property.value: Play after one of your Teams successfully investigates a Site with Alien Investigation or Bureaucracy skill as a prerequisite. Place this card in your Bureau. Discard this card to negate one Alien or Government Adversary.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "There were tanks here, and five bodies suspended in solution. There were computers monitoring them. They were alive Scully, underwater!" - Mulder

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Maybe the worm feeds on the acetylcholine which floods our capacity to control violent behavior." - Dr. Hodge

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one Affiliation question or one Method question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "We wanted to listen. On October 12, 1992 NASA initiated the high resolution microwave survey. A decade long search by radio-telescope scanning 10 million frequencies for any transmission by extraterrestrial intelligence." - Mulder

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one Affiliation question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "She was trying to cleanse the house of evil. She thought Charlie was responsible somehow." - Maggie Holvey on events leading to her mother's death.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one Motive question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I could have swore I saw red eyes and fangs." - Mr. Parker

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one Motive question or one Method question. If you ask if the Method is Possession, the skill check prerequisite is 4+.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "In one week, Luther Lee Boggs will take a seat in a North Carolina gas chamber." - Mulder

card.name: Church Of The Red Museum, Delta Glen, WI

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one Affiliation question or one Method question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Today we bear witness to three that do not believe. We encourage them to open their hearts and minds to our teachings, that they who slaughter the flesh, slaughter their own souls and must be taught the way." - Richard Odin

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I think that whatever it was, he took it with him, and that was the only way he knew how to stop it." - Mulder describing Colonel Belts' heroic sacrifice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Force an opponent Team to make a Computer 4+ skill check or they will be unable to complete the skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Come on, come on, let me in damn it." - Brad Wilczek

property.name: Text
property.value: Play after one of your Teams successfully investigates a Site with Alien Investigation skill as a prerequisite. Place this card in your Bureau. Discard this card to add +1 to an Alien Investigation skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "I don't understand, how can they just disappear? They have no means of transportation."Mulder: "No earthly means of transportation."

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one Affiliation question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "I thought this was about escaped prisoners."Scully: "It is."Mulder: "Then who are the men in the funny suits?"

property.name: Text
property.value: Unless a Healing card is played immediately and the card results in 1 point being healed, move the Agent to the Hospital. The Agent must stay in hospital for the next turn.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "Mulder, get them off me!"Mulder: "They're not just on you, they're everywhere."

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Agent damaged by the Deadly Blur is placed in the hospital for the next two turns regardless of how much Health they have. Each opponent's LRC and CRC is reduced one point. The Deadly Blur may use Subterfuge Combat cards.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "No human pilot walked away from the wreckage I saw."Scully: "Well, maybe he ejected."

property.name: Text
property.value: Ask any one Characteristic question regarding one opponent's X‐File. Remove this card from the game. The effects of this card may not be negated.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Mr. Mulder, they've been here for a very, very long time." - Deep Throat

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to change a Site prerequisite to Bureaucracy 3+.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I don't work for you sir, and unless you hear differently from the Attorney General, this case is a local matter." - Detective Thompson

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I say the Earth holds some truths best left buried." - Dr. Daniel Trepkos

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds +2 to one Team's Medical skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "It's been 36 hours since your rescue. I've got you on dialysis with a high flux filter. You're obviously responding well. Your electrolytes are almost back to normal and your fluid status has been corrected." - Dr. Laskos

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "They took her, I told you they were gonna take somebody else." - Duane Barry describing Scully's abduction.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I contend that perhaps through a genetic mutation Eugene Tooms is capable of contorting and elongating his body in order to gain access to his victims." - Mulder under oath at Toom's psychiatric review.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Psychotic behavior didn't develop in the Adams and Eves until age 16; homicidal behavior at 20. Imagine my disappointment when I learned of your accelerated development." - Eve 7

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Iraqi Air Command (translated): "You're under attack!"Iraqi Pilot (translated): "I'm locked in. It's a hit! I got him!"

property.name: Text
property.value: This card will negate one Event card played on your Team.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder's phone rings. "If that's the lovely Agent Scully, let her know I've been working out. I'm buff!" - Frohike

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one Affiliation question or one Result question. If you ask if the Result is Manipulation Of Evidence, the skill check prerequisite is 4+.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "A nuclear submarine located his craft in the Boffort Sea five days ago. They were ordered to destroy it, but they were disabled. An attack fleet left port from Anchorage this morning to make sure this man does not leave." - X

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds +1 to the Agent's Alien Investigation skill.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "The radiation level is five times the norm." - Mulder on the radiation levels at a U.F.O. site.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one Affiliation question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Sally Kendrick was using the clinic to carry on the Lichefield experiment. She was cloning herself." - Mulder

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one Method question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "The town was founded back in the twenties, when some of Barnum & Baileys' troupes started coming down here during the winter off-season." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Select one card from your Discard Pile and place it in your hand.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "That gives us an area of just over 3 square miles to cover, roughly a thousand households." - Mulder searching for Scully.

property.name: Text
property.value: Force the Team investigating a Site to discard one Equipment card of your choice.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "My name is Trondheim, Henry Trondheim. The ship you want is the Za'Ahr. It's a fifty ton trawler with a double hull, it's my ship." - Henry Trondheim

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds +1 to the Agent's Occult Investigation skill.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "So your saying a ghost killed Teddy Holvey. Has anyone checked the camera that took this photo? The lens and the pressure plate?" - Scully

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "You should have seen her, she was beautiful."Scully: "Yeah, well she just about ripped your lungs out."

card.name: Lake Okobogee, Campsite #53, Sioux City, IA

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one Motive question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You don't believe in UFO's; guess you haven't been out to Lake Okobogee." - Bartender at the Pennsylvania Pub.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to prevent one Agent assigned to a Site from contributing the Agent's skills to the one skill check (your choice) that the Team makes this turn.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Colonel Henderson: "We're trying to contain an ecological disaster.Mulder: "That's a lot of firepower just to protect Mother Nature."

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one Affiliation question or one Method question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Their need is insatiable, but murdering for blood risks exposure and capture. If my profile of previous cases holds true, they've been living in the city and working near blood products for the past month." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: The Agent may add his skills to a skill check that is occuring in another Section of the table. The Agent's skill is reduced by 1 (i.e., Skill: 3 becomes Skill: 2). LRC and CRC may not be added.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "The single connecting trace evidence in the killing is the destruction of an electrical device at the crime scene. A pager, a fax, a cellular phone, a gas pump digital display." - Mulder, on the murders in Franklin PA.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one Affiliation question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "See you tomorrow morning Scully, bright and early. We leave for the very plausible state of Oregon at 8:00 A.M." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Force an opponent Team to make a Criminal Investigation 5+ skill check or they will be unable to add their skills to a Site skill check this turn.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "It came up through channels. From Mulder's ASAC to the district G-14 and onto my desk." - Section Chief Scott Blevins

property.name: Text
property.value: The Poltergeist is unaffected by Combat attacks. It will attack for only one Long Range and one Close Range Combat round and then leave.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Lauren, how will you be able to rest if he never can?" - Scully questioning Lauren Kyte concerning the poltergeist Howard Graves

property.name: Text
property.value: Long Range Combat attacks cause only half damage (round up) to the Zombie.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "He's non-verbal, non-responsive to voice, touch or pain. The neurologist suspects he's suffered a severe concussion in the crash resulting in amnesia." Mulder: "That's a plausible diagnosis only I'm more interested in how he came back to life."

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one Method question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "To fit in with her brothers, Dana also shot at the snake." - Margaret Scully

property.name: Text
property.value: Decrease all of the skill levels on one Agent (your choice) by one for this turn only.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Scully: "Mulder, you know that proper surveillance requires two pairs of agents, one pair relieving the other after twelve hours."Mulder: "Article thirty, paragraph eight point seven."

property.name: Text
property.value: Pick one Agent in the Team. That Agent is placed 10 cards down, face up, in the owning player's Bureau Deck. Any equipment the Agent had is discarded. When the Agent's card reaches the top of the deck, the Agent is immediately moved to the Hospital (undamaged). This card does not initiate Combat.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "Scully, snake skin!"Scully: "There's a python in Paddock's room!"

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place 1 [RP] on this card. This [RP] may be used to pay for any Keyword Behavioral or Observation cards. If you use this [RP], replace it during your Briefing Phase.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Agent Karen Kossoff is an F.B.I. crisis counselor who has assisited Mulder and Scully on several cases, most notably counseling Scully in "Irresistable", and family intervention in "The Calusari" and "Born Again".

property.name: Text
property.value: Search through your Bureau Deck and place any one Witness card in your hand. Show the Witness to your opponents. Shuffle the Bureau Deck.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You want to see what it takes to find the truth Agent Mulder? You want to know the things I know?" - X

property.name: Text
property.value: Regardless of how much damage is done to this creature in the Long Range Combat round, it will attack in the Close Range Combat round. If its Health has been exceeded it is removed at the end of the Close Combat round.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "They are the Calusari. In Romania they are responsible for the correct observance of sacred rites." - Maggie Holvey

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You can kill me now, but you'll never know the truth. And that's why I'll win." - The Cigarette Smoking Man

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "The Manitou is an evil spirit capable of changing a man into a beast." - Sioux Tribal Elder

property.name: Text
property.value: The Mechanic may use Martial Arts and Subterfuge Combat cards.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Mulder: "There were three men last night, I was chased!" Deep Throat: "If you were chased you would have been killed. Those men are trained for that sort of business, and they are trained very well."

property.name: Text
property.value: Change any Keyword to any other Keyword on a card played by your opponent. This effect lasts until the end of the turn.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Nothing vanishes without a trace, burn it!" - Cigarette Smoking Man

property.name: Text
property.value: You may move one of your Agents to any Section immediately. This card may not be played once an Adversary has forced combat until after the combat is resolved. The Agent may join any Team that occupies the new Section.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "We've got a charter flight waiting to take us to Seattle. From there a helicopter will fly us to Mount Avalon." - Dr. Adma Pierce

property.name: Text
property.value: Play when an Agent is forced to go to the Hospital. He must still go to the Hospital by the end of this turn but he may add his skills to one skill check before going.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Crew Cut Man: "Your cellular phone has been ringing of the hook." Mulder: "I'm a popular guy, why don't you answer it for me." Crew Cut Man: "I don't like talking on the phone. I have this thing about unsecured lines."

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one Motive question or one Result question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Well, whatever it was it was dropped off the screen at 24:18 sir. Hit ground just west of Lake Michigan outside Townsend Wisconsin." - Air Force Air Traffic Controller

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds +1 to the Agent's Subterfuge skill.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I had enough on that surveillance to arrest those suspects after 3 days, I could have nailed them on 40 counts of bank fraud. But you left me there. I'm surprised you even noticed I was gone." - Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: Negate any one Keyword Adversary card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You still don't get it do you? The truth is still out there, but it's never been more dangerous. The man we both knew paid for that information with his life; a sacrifice I'm not willing to make." - X
